mapper.select: SELECT pixiv from a_user_found WHERE qq = #{qq} LIMIT 1
SELECT id,url,type from a_image_url WHERE type = #{type}

SELECT t1.id, url, type FROM a_image_url AS t1 JOIN ( SELECT ROUND( RAND() * ( (SELECT MAX(id) FROM a_image_url) - (SELECT MIN(id) FROM a_image_url) ) + (SELECT MIN(id) FROM a_image_url) ) AS id ) AS t2 WHERE t1.id >= t2.id ORDER BY t1.id LIMIT 1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO a_user_found (qq, name, group_id, pixiv) VALUES (#{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name}, #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE group_id = #{groupId}, name = #{name}, pixiv = pixiv + 1
